body:
Comment 1: 
The proposed solution is to try several other good addresses for heap before falling
back to 32-bit mode. 0x7fff addresses inherently conflict with other potential
allocations and also more problematic for the partially conservative GC. A good address
in the middle of virtual address space is definitely better.
We can try several good predefined options like 0x00c0, 0x04c0, and then try all 0xXXc0
addresses where XX=00..7f.
